commit.message:
re PR target/37880 (Documentation of option -mcmodel=medium is wrong)

	PR target/37880
	* doc/invoke.texi: Fix spelling of -mlarge-data-threshold option.
	Adjust -mcmodel=medium description for 2005-07-31 changes.

From-SVN: r141281

files.patch:

+	Adjust -mcmodel=medium description for 2005-07-31 changes.
